summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were higher on Tuesday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Jan. 17
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were higher on Tuesday, with 17 gaining and the other two declining.
Bitcoin rose slightly to $21,317 by market close.
